name: generic_framework_adapter
description: Generic template for creating adapters for agent frameworks

framework.description: Framework information object containing name, version, classes, etc.

module_name.description: Name of the framework's main module to import

adapter_methods.initialize: Sets up the framework with configuration
adapter_methods.run_agent_task: Executes a task using an agent
adapter_methods.get_agent_status: Gets the current status of an agent
adapter_methods.shutdown: Performs clean shutdown of the adapter
